bai-jin-yan-api Backend Program 
 
Usage: 
1. Make sure MySQL database is installed 
2. Import SQL files from manifest/sql directory 
3. Modify database configuration in manifest/config/config.yaml 
4. Double click bai-jin-yan-api.exe to run 
5. Default access address: http://localhost:8000 
 
Directory Structure: 
- manifest/config/  Configuration files 
- manifest/sql/     Database initialization scripts 
- public/uploads/   File upload directory 
- temp/logs/        Log files directory 
 
Notes: 
- Configure database connection before first run 
- Make sure port 8000 is not occupied 
- Uploaded files will be saved in public/uploads directory
